caption.p: Antioxidant activities of the aerial parts and root extracts of Z. spinosa in comparison to the standard, i.e., ascorbic acid: (a) IC 50 ( μg/mL) values of the 1,1-diphenyl-2-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) assay; (b) IC 50 ( μg/mL) values of the hydrogen peroxide (H 2O 2) scavenging assay. AEE, aqueous ethanol extract; AME, aqueous methanol extract.
